title: $500M Flows MIA for Month: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Dec. 11, 2025

title: Coinbase opens Solana DEX access as CeFi and DeFi converge
contentSnippet: Coinbase has plugged directly into Solana’s fast-growing DeFi ecosystem, letting users trade any Solana token via DEX rails without a formal listing.

title: Here’s Why Bitcoin is Falling Despite the Fed's Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Analysts say the Fed’s rate cut was priced in, driving Bitcoin lower as risks like sticky inflation and the 2026 election cycle mount.

title: Disgraced Terraform Labs Founder Do Kwon Faces Sentencing Today
contentSnippet: The upcoming sentencing comes after the South Korean entrepreneur pleaded guilty to defrauding investors in August.

title: Sky's Keel Starts $500M Investment Campaign to Boost RWAs on Solana
contentSnippet: The Tokenization Regatta aims to allocate funds and support to projects bringing tokenized real-world assets to the Solana network.

title: Marketnode, Lion Global Bring Singapore-Vaulted Gold Fund Onchain on Solana
contentSnippet: The fund offers exposure to physical gold bars vaulted and insured in Singapore, with traditional custody and an option for in-kind redemption.

title: Bubblemaps challenges PEPE’s fair launch, alleges 30% of genesis supply bundled
contentSnippet: About 30% of the initial PEPE supply was bundled under the same entity, which sold $2 million worth of tokens the day after launch, according to Bubblemaps.

title: Revolut and Trust Wallet Launch Instant Crypto Buys in EU With Self-Custody Focus
contentSnippet: The integration allows users to buy crypto and have it sent directly to their Trust Wallet, a self-custodial app, giving them full control of their assets from the moment of purchase.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Traders Seek Catalysts After Bitcoin’s Post-Fed Pullback
contentSnippet: The crypto market slipped to the lower end of its range after the Federal Reserve’s 25bps rate cut failed to spark fresh momentum.

title: UK Bitcoin Company Satsuma Sells 579 of Its 1,199 Bitcoin for $53.2 Million
contentSnippet: The company sells BTC to secure cash for upcoming loan note obligations ahead of its planned uplisting.

title: Poland resubmits vetoed crypto bill with ‘not even a comma’ changed
contentSnippet: The Polish government reintroduced an identical version of an 84-page crypto bill that was vetoed by the president, raising questions about local versus centralized EU oversight.

title: UAE telco giant e& taps dirham stablecoin for bill payments pilot
contentSnippet: The MoU marks a cautious step toward real-world stablecoin payments in the UAE, with e& assessing how AE Coin may integrate into its digital channels.

title: XRP transaction fees drop 89%: Is price headed below $1.75?
contentSnippet: XRP price risked a 15% drop to as low as $1.73, fuelled by collapsing transaction fees, reduced speculator appetite and a weakening technical structure.

title: BTC, Nasdaq Futures Drop as Oracle Earnings Revive AI Bubble Fears
contentSnippet: Oracle shares tanked after the firm revealed an earnings miss.

title: NYSE、サトシ・ナカモト像を設置　ウォール街の変化示す
contentSnippet: ニューヨーク証券取引所がビットコイン創始者サトシ・ナカモトの像を設置。設置者のトゥエンティワン・キャピタルは約4万BTC保有で世界3位。伝統的金融が仮想通貨を受け入れる象徴的出来事に。

title: Norway’s central bank says CBDC ‘not warranted,’ cites strong payment system
contentSnippet: Norway rules that a digital krone is unnecessary for now, highlighting its strong payment rails and the uncertain benefits of both retail and wholesale CBDCs.

title: テザーとHoneyCoinが提携、アフリカでUSDT決済を拡大
contentSnippet: テザーはHoneyCoinと戦略的提携を発表し、アフリカでのUSDT決済拡大を目指す。HoneyCoinはQRコードや専用端末に対応したPOSネットワークを導入し、加盟店が直接USDTを受け取れる仕組みを構築。まずケニアでサービスを開始し、他市場へ展開予定。現地通貨の変動リスクを避けたいユーザーの需要に応え、アフリカにおけるステーブルコイン普及を加速させる。

title: State Street, Galaxy and Ondo join tokenized cash race with 24/7 sweep fund
contentSnippet: State Street Investment Management and Galaxy Asset Management are launching a tokenized private liquidity fund on Solana, with Ondo expected to invest $200 million.

title: コインチェックがソラナ（SOL）の取扱いを開始
contentSnippet: コインチェックがソラナ（SOL）の取扱いを開始。販売所・取引所・つみたてに対応し、1万円購入で抽選1万円分のSOLが当たるキャンペーンも実施中。

title: Gemini Approved by CFTC to Offer U.S. Prediction Markets, Stock Surges Nearly 14%
contentSnippet: The decision allows Gemini’s affiliate to offer supervised event-contract markets to U.S. users, adding regulated forecasting tools as the firm expands its product lineup.

title: ブータン都市GMC、金裏付けトークン「TER」発行へ　ソラナ活用
contentSnippet: ブータンの特別都市GMCが、金を裏付け資産とする国家支援型トークン「TER」をソラナ基盤で発行。DK Bankが販売・保管を担い、同国のデジタル経済戦略を加速させる取り組みとなる。

title: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニ、CFTC承認で予測市場参入へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニがCFTCから予測市場運営の承認を取得。関連会社ジェミニ・タイタンを通じて二者択一式イベント契約を提供する。カルシとポリマーケットが急成長する予測市場で、競争が激化している。

title: Ether, Dogecoin, Solana Slide as Bitcoin Fails to Sustain Early-Week Breakout
contentSnippet: The pullback followed Tuesday's brief spike above $94,500, a move that triggered a minor short squeeze but failed to break the resistance that has capped bitcoin for most of the past three weeks.

title: Crypto Drop Wipes Out $370M in Bullish Bets as BTC, ETH Give Back Gains
contentSnippet: Binance, Hyperliquid, and Bybit were the most affected exchanges, comprising 72% of all forced unwinds.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto statue lands on NYSE in sign of changing times
contentSnippet: There are five other Satoshi statues made by Valentina Picozzi located around the world, in Switzerland, El Salvador, Japan, Vietnam and Miami, in the US state of Florida.

title: Gemini Gets CFTC Approval to Launch Prediction Markets in US
contentSnippet: The CFTC license will let Gemini offer event contracts in the U.S., joining Kalshi and Polymarket in a booming market.

title: 仮想通貨業界トップ、米CFTC新設諮問会議に参加へ
contentSnippet: 米CFTCが「CEOイノベーション評議会」を設立し、クラーケンやジェミナイなど仮想通貨業界トップが参加。デリバティブ市場の構造変化やトークン化について議論。仮想通貨担保のパイロットプログラムも開始。

title: Australian regulator eases rules for stablecoins and wrapped tokens
contentSnippet: Australia’s securities regulator has removed licensing requirements for stablecoin intermediaries and approved omnibus accounts, reducing compliance costs.

title: GOP hardliners vexed as defense bill advances without CBDC ban
contentSnippet: Conservatives in the Republican Party are frustrated that a promised ban on central bank digital currencies didn’t make it into a must-pass defense bill that’s now on its way to the Senate.

title: レイヤーゼロ（ZRO）とは？スターゲートの使い方・バイバックの仕組みを解説
contentSnippet: レイヤーゼロ（LayerZero）の仕組みやZROトークンのバイバック、スターゲートを使ったブリッジ方法を初心者向けに解説。Stargate買収の背景やリスクまでわかりやすく紹介します。

title: Bhutan Launches Sovereign Gold-Backed Token on Solana
contentSnippet: The launch adds to Bhutan’s broader blockchain push, including Bitcoin reserves, Binance Pay integration and hydro-powered BTC mining.

title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on 2026 Boom, Not a Santa Rally, Following Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Bitcoin options traders are tempering expectations for a Santa rally and are now looking to $130,000 and $180,000 strikes in Q1, 2026.

title: イーロンのスペースX、146億円相当のビットコイン移動　IPO関連か？
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏率いるスペースXが約146億円相当のビットコインを移動した。10月から毎週大規模な送金を継続しており、IPO計画との関連が注目されている。

title: トム・リー氏、「イーサリアムは既に底打ち」　先週690億円相当を購入
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長トム·リー氏が、イーサリアムは既に底入れしたと発言。同社は先週、約4億6,000万ドル相当のETHを購入し、10月以来最大規模の買い増しを実施。今後10~15年間、ビットコインよりもイーサリアムの将来性に期待を寄せている。

title: FRBの慎重姿勢でビットコイン反落　2026年の利下げは限定的か
contentSnippet: FRBは25bpの利下げを決定したが、パウエル議長の慎重姿勢を受けビットコインは下落した。2026年の追加利下げは1回との見方が広がる中、グラスノードのデータは実現損失が1日5.5億ドルとFTX崩壊時並みの高水準を示す。機関投資家の本格参入で4年サイクル終焉論も加速。

title: Hong Kong Cardinal Calls AI a 'Gift From God' as Asian Bishops Mull Ethical Challenges
contentSnippet: Regional church leaders met to establish guidelines for the use of AI in ministry, education, and content.

title: Bitcoin Exchange Paxful Agrees to Plead Guilty, Hit With $7.5 Million in Penalties
contentSnippet: Authorities say Paxful was used by money launderers and other criminals—and that the Bitcoin exchange knew about it.

title: Official Trump Crypto Game Revealed With $1 Million in Solana Meme Coin Rewards
contentSnippet: Trump Billionaires Club on iOS and Android will launch by year's end and offer $1 million worth of the president's meme coin as rewards.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves Bitcoin Ahead of Potential Record IPO
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's private aerospace company SpaceX moved more of its Bitcoin holdings on Wednesday ahead of reported blockbuster IPO plans.

title: Crypto Debanking and Efforts to 'Weaponize Finance' Must End, Says Top US Banking Regulator
contentSnippet: Major U.S. banks denied services to crypto and other lawful businesses based on industry rather than risk, an OCC preliminary report finds.
